required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Collect Survival Data on Patients Previously Enrolled in Abraxane Pancreatic Cancer Study CA046.
clinical_study.official_title: MPACT Extension Study: Multicenter, Survival Data Collection in Subjects Previously Enrolled in Protocol CA046

brief_summary.textblock: A study to collect survival data on patients previously enrolled in Abraxane pancreatic cancer study CA046.

detailed_description.textblock:
A study to collect survival status of CA046 subjects who were know to be alive at the last report of vital status for CA046 - approximate timeframe - end of March, 2013. Once consent is given, on a quarterly basis, information on status will be collected to include:
- Vital Status
- Date of disease progression
- Subsequent anticancer therapy for pancreatic adenocarcinoma

secondary_outcome.description: Date of disease progression and subsequent anticancer therapy for pancreatic adenocarcinoma other than that already recorded for subject while enrolled in CA046

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients previously enrolled in study CA046
arm_group.description: No intervention is being given in this extension study which is gathering survival information on participants of study NCT 00844649 (Celgene study CA046) who were known to be alive as of March 2013)

intervention.description: No intervention is being given in this extension study which is gathering survival information on participants of study NCT 00844649 (Celgene study CA046) who were known to be alive as of March 2013)
intervention.arm_group_label: Patients previously enrolled in study CA046

study_pop.textblock: Patients previously enrolled in study CA046

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Must have been enrolled in the CA046 study Must have been living at the time of the last survival follow-up (approximate timeframe - end of March, 2013) Must understand and be able to give informed consent (if a subject is deceased, proper legal consent (ie, next of kin, legal representative) will be obtained prior to collection of data)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Consent refused for any reason
